page.title: 07THE HIGH STREET
page.content: The{High Street}is quite an old road.When you first come into Christchurch you see the rivers and their floodplains and then you see the roundabout with the trees and the flowers on it.{Saxon Square}is new with lots of new shops in it.It cost a lot of money to build.It was opened by the Mayor on the 28th September 1983.It is a quiet shopping centre and overlooking it is a church.If you go further on down the road towards the {Priory}the shops begin to get smaller and older .Also there there is a pub called{The Olde George Inn}which years ago the horses and carts came to.The High Street although it is the main road is very narrow but still hundreds of cars go along that road every day.
